title.value: UK Core Blood Pressure Device Type

description.value: A code from the SNOMED CT UK coding system for the typoe of device used to measure blood pressure. Selected from the SNOMED CT UK coding system: - 43770009 | Doppler device (physical object) - 469801002 | Invasive blood pressure monitor (physical object) - 258057004 | Non-invasive blood pressure monitor (physical object) - DescendantOrSelfOf 39690000 | Sphygmomanometer, device (physical object)
